channel.title: How to decrease font size in Draft list?
channel.description:
Since updating to Bug Sur the draft list seem to have a pretty big font size which I am not able to reduce. I am only able to see the first 45 letters of the title. "⌘ -" only changes the size in the draft, but not in the draft list.
Is there a possibility to use a smaller font in the drafts list?

item.title: How to decrease font size in Draft list?
item.dc:creator: agiletortoise
item.description:
The draft list font size is not adjustable on Mac. It was not increased, but Big Sur did add margins which take away from the amount allowed for display. These are standard system font sizes, not likely to change that behavior, though I could allow the panel to be made wider in future updates.
